instructions: Open the Settings app. Select Display . Select Wallpaper . In the Choose wallpaper from list, select a location. Choose Gallery to use one of your own images. Choose Wallpapers to use a stock image. If you chose Wallpapers , scroll through the list of images or installed wallpapers. As you scroll, the screen changes to display the selected wallpaper. If you chose Gallery or My photos , a file browser opens. Tap menu (the three stacked lines) and select Images . In the list of image locations, navigate to the folder where the background image is stored, then tap the thumbnail of the image. In the Wallpapers screen, your chosen image is at the front of the wallpaper list and selected. To make the change, tap Set wallpaper . Your chosen wallpaper is applied to the home screen.

Long press the wallpaper on the home screen. Long press until you feel a feedback vibration and the screen changes. Tap Wallpapers . Browse the existing choices of wallpapers and live wallpapers or tap My Photos to choose a photo from your gallery. Live wallpapers look the same as standard wallpapers when viewed in the browser. These background images say Animated in the thumbnail, indicating that the wallpaper on the phone is interactive. Tap Set Wallpaper . The main screen appears with the new wallpaper. Repeat steps 1 through 5 anytime you want to change the look of your home screen.
